description.part1: Rentos Group is an investment and development company. Its key areas of activity are:
description.part2: Today, the company owns and manages a diversified portfolio of properties covering over 40,000 sq.m.
description.objects: Among them: ZLATA PLAZA shopping mall and Pokrovskyi shopping center, FORT logistics complex, as well as office properties and street retail facilities in Rivne and the Slon shopping center in Lutsk.

block_1.title: Vision
block_1.subtitle: To be a leader in investment and development, setting standards for transparency, sustainability, and strategic thinking

block_2.title: Mission
block_2.subtitle: To create modern and comfortable spaces for successful partner activities based on professionalism, responsibility, and sustainable development

hero.title: RENTOS GROUP – YOUR PARTNER IN BUSINESS DEVELOPMENT
hero.subtitle: We combine experience, reputation and efficiency for the long-term success of our projects

stats.years_desc: Market experience – stability and quality, proven over time
stats.visitors_desc: Daily they choose us, trusting our experience
stats.projects_desc: Successfully implemented – our clients return because they get results

investments.title: INVESTMENTS
investments.text: We welcome investment proposals and analyze the market for promising opportunities.

management.title: MANAGEMENT
management.text: Our management team possesses deep insights into local market nuances and applies effective solutions for tenant relations, process analysis, cost optimization, and financial & technical management.

development.title: DEVELOPMENT
development.text: We execute projects from analyzing the commercial viability of land plots to the full launch of commercialized properties. Redevelopment and reconstruction are among our core competencies, transforming projects into modern commercial spaces based on current demands.

News.title: NEWS
News.description: Stay updated with our latest news and events.

Projects.title: PROJECTS
Projects.description: Explore our diverse portfolio of completed projects.

sub_1.item_1: Rentos Group voluntarily expands the impact of its activities and its responsibility in social and environmental spheres.
sub_1.item_2: Our team has identified responsibility and care for people and the environment as the company’s core values.

sub_2.item_1: We support environmental projects, youth and sports, culture and education, as well as charitable foundations aimed at treating children and addressing other social challenges, including inclusivity and accessibility.
sub_2.item_2: We are convinced that by joining forces, we can achieve more!
